code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";const useVoucher=()=>{const[voucher,setVoucher]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchVoucher=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("/api/getAllVoucher");setVoucher(response.data.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching flights:",error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchVoucher();},[]);return{voucher,loading};};export default useVoucher;
